# activation

**Instance Property**

The activation function that the layer applies to the output.

## Declaration

```swift
var activation: BNNSActivation
```

## Instance Properties

- **i_desc**: The descriptor of the input.
- **o_desc**: The descriptor of the output.
- **axis_flags**: Flags that indicate axes on which to apply certain activation functions.

items.description: Flags that indicate axes on which to apply certain activation functions.
